input.sentences: the bride wore the traditional color for weddings in her culture .
she changed dresses for the reception and shared food with her new husband .
everyone had a great time | telling stories and sharing jokes .
we all lined up to greet the family .
blessing the family and offering good wishes was an important part of the celebration .
output.sentences: She wore her traditional attire that is worn in weddings.
The new husband shared the cake at the reception.
The wedding guests had an interesting time telling stories.
The family lined up to great the couple.
The family offered many good wishes to the new couple.
